ResourceHeader.ResourceName: "SIMPLE" EVENTS:   FRONTSIDE HALO CMES AND ASSOCIATED ACTIVITY AT 1 AU
ResourceHeader.Description: A summary table of parameters associated with Coronal Mass Ejections (CMEs) using data sets from GOES, Yohkoh, SOHO, Wind, ACE.

Parameter.Name: First obs.
Parameter.Description: CME time when CME first detected usually in C2 field. A means an Alert issued.

Parameter.Name: SOLAR SURFACE ACTIVITY, Span
Parameter.Description: Span is width of CME and in what direction it was first seen or brightest.

Parameter.Name: SOLAR SURFACE ACTIVITY, Flare
Parameter.Description: Flare is GOES X-ray peak and Ha peak level (top) and onset time (bottom)

Parameter.Name: SOLAR SURFACE ACTIVITY, DSF?
Parameter.Description: DSF is if an Ha filament has disappeared. (Imp.) is obs. importance of disappearance.

Parameter.Name: SOLAR SURFACE ACTIVITY, Dimming?
Parameter.Description: Dimming is from Yohkoh or EIT 195 images.

Parameter.Name: SOLAR SURFACE ACTIVITY, Wave?
Parameter.Description: Wave is from D. Meyers EIT list (thru June 1998), or EIT Alert movie.

Parameter.Name: 1 AU ACTIVITY, Shock/SEP
Parameter.Description:
Shock is the day and hour of an IP shock, usually at WIND (top)		
SEP is the day and hour of a solar energetic part. event at WIND (bot.)

Parameter.Name: 1 AU ACTIVITY, Mag.Cl
Parameter.Description:
Mag. Cl. is a cloud-like structure at WIND or ACE.
FR in this col. means cloud can be fit to an MFI flux rope model.

Parameter.Name: 1 AU ACTIVITY, BDE/Ejecta?
Parameter.Description: BDE is from ACE or WIND 3DP lists or plots. HC is ejecta from Cane list. He is enh. 3He from Ho et al.

Parameter.Name: 1 AU ACTIVITY, Storm
Parameter.Description: Storm is peak intensity and day and hour of storm with Dst<-50nT.
